ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
ygData.msgSnippet: ditto on the usually, sometimes someone has to make a stand though ... From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@redback.com] Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 1:47 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
ditto on the usually, sometimes someone has to make a stand though

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 1:47 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians


i usually try not to stoop to their level. some may disagree.

At 01:24 PM 6/1/00 -0600, you wrote:
>Only in response to equally jerky guys that need to be taught a lesson.
>this guy sounds like he fits the bill.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
>Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 1:30 PM
>To: eqbards@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
>
>
>I would say that having his pet kill him is a pretty jerk thing to do,
since
>that
>would cause him to lose experience. i would hope that people on this list
>aren't that
>nasty that they would be advocating this.
